unnormalised: ## Automotive News: Traffic Woes & New Rules – Kuch Toh Gadbad Hai!
normalised: ## Automotive News: Traffic Woes and New Rules – Kuch Toh Gadbad Hai!

unnormalised: Traffic in Bengaluru is, as always, chakka jam! But hold your horses, folks, because the traffic police are cracking down with some new regulations. Forget that chai break at your usual tapri, because stricter parking rules are now in effect across MG Road and Brigade Road. No more haphazardly parking your scooty!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from the Traffic Department says they're trying to unclog the city's arteries. Apparently, illegal parking fines have been hiked up – brace yourselves for a whopping Rs. 2000 penalty for repeat offenders!
normalised: Doctor Sharma from the Traffic Department says they're trying to unclog the city's arteries. Apparently, illegal parking fines have been hiked up – brace yourselves for a whopping rupee two thousand penalty for repeat offenders!

unnormalised: Also, whispers are going around that they’re considering implementing odd-even schemes like Delhi did, depending on the vehicle registration number. Uff! Talk about drama!
normalised: Also, whispers are going around that they’re considering implementing odd-even schemes like Delhi did, depending on the vehicle registration number. Uff! Talk about drama!

unnormalised: Adding to the chaos, new speed limits are being considered on the NICE Road – dropping from 100 km/h to 80 km/h in certain stretches. Seems like they want us to enjoy the scenery, whether we like it or not.
normalised: Adding to the chaos, new speed limits are being considered on the N I C E Road – dropping from one hundred kilometer per hour to eighty kilometer per hour in certain stretches. Seems like they want us to enjoy the scenery, whether we like it or not.

unnormalised: Plus, keep an eye out for new surveillance cameras popping up. They're even talking about using drones to monitor traffic flow in areas like Koramangala. One can only hope they improve the infrastructure instead of just adding more rules. Rumor has it, 10000 sq ft of land is being acquired to build new parking spaces near Majestic. Let's see how this all plays out, eh? Jai Hind!
